Class.ClassComment:
InfoStreams /** * The Basic Services provide InfoStreams for reporting information.

When creating a message for a stream, you can create an initial entry with header information and then append to it as many times as desired.

* @see HeaderPrintWriter */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Return the default stream. If the default stream could not be set up as requested then it points indirectly to System.err. * @return the default stream. */
